cell.paragraph:
Documenting an Eiffel ENViSioN! project can be done only through using the
\10_Developing\10_Getting_Started\10_Using_ENViSioN\10_Adding_A_New_Project\html_report_wizard.htm HTML Report Project Wizard from the Add New Project dialog. This project wizard is only available in the Eiffel ENViSioN! Enterprise Edition.
cell.heading: 2Documentation Checklist
cell.paragraph: The only prerequiste of documenting an Eiffel ENViSioN! project is that the project be compiled successfully as the HTML Report Project Wizard requires and makes use of the compiled project epr file.
cell.heading: 2Visual Studio.NET Help Projects
cell.paragraph: The HTML Report Project Wizard does not create a new project once it has completed. Instead, on successful completion, you will be presented with generated files, at the location specified, in a new Windows Explorer. From there you can add and remove items at your discretion and even modify the default.css Cascading Style Sheet (CSS) to present the documentation in the manner best suited to you.
